properties.body:
1. HYDROARC WARNINGS IN FORCE AS OF 221243Z DEC 17:
   421/17, 420/17, 419/17, 418/17, 322/17, 307/17,
   306/17, 293/17, 288/17, 287/17, 274/17, 267/17,
   228/17, 189/17, 188/17, 139/17.
   205/16, 155/16.
   345/15, 343/15.
   269/14, 268/14, 131/14.
   193/12, 112/12.
2. THE COMPLETE TEXT OF ALL IN-FORCE HYDROARC
   BROADCAST WARNINGS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE NGA
   MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION WEBSITE AT:
   msi.nga.mil/NGAPortal/MSI.portal.
   ALTERNATIVELY, THESE MAY BE REQUESTED BY E-MAIL
   FROM NGA AT NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL.
3. CANCEL HYDROARC 415/17.
